title: The Worst-Case Scenario Survival Handbook: Christmas
description: Turkey on fire? Obnoxious relatives headed your way? No one to kiss on New Year's Eve? Here are illustrated, step-by-step instructions to help you survive the joys of the Christmas holiday season;How to Silence a Group of Carol SingersHow to Rescue Someone Stuck in a ChimneyHow to Deal with a Cancelled FlightHow to Untangle Christmas Tree LightsHow to Treat a Tongue Stuck to a PoleHow to Thwart Gift SnoopersHow to Overcome Christmas DepressionHow to Explain That There is No Santa... and dozens of other festivities gone awry.
author: Joshua Piven
